allowed to become sour and thick, or made from sour milk that has become thick: If buttermilk isn't available, clabbered milk can be used instead. There are two ways to make curd from clabbered milk. Wait until the milk is thicker, but not quite clabbered.
More examplesFewer examplesTo make clabbered milk, mix 1 cup milk with 1 tablespoon lemon juice and let stand 10 minutes.Clabbered milk can also be made into cottage cheese.If you just drained a clabbered milk, you'd have something similar to a yogurt cheese like labneh.
